body: At 5th level, an archivist can use any skill, even if the skill normally requires him to be trained. At 11th level, he considers all skills to be class skills, and at 17th level he can take 10 on any skill check, even if it is not normally allowed. This ability replaces lore master.
name: Jack of All Trades
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Bard/Bard Archetypes/Archivist/Jack of All Trades
